answers.answer: It sounds like you're doing what you can already, I'd be having the dr check more out, a lot can cause your period to be late, and cause you to have symptoms besides just pregnancy. I'd ask for an ultrasound just to check and make sure everything is ok, especially if you miss another period. Good luck!

question: hi this is new for me but i really need answers. my period is 20 days late several home tests have come up negative today i started very light spotting. my doctor said she wouldn't do a blood test but did draw blood for some other test like diabetes metabolic panel and my thyroid all tests came back perfectly normal. stress has never really affected anything on me at all. and im really not all that stressed anyway. i don't know what could be the problem before i missed my period i was having nausea vommitting very gagy smells and tastes were way off im really tired all the time and very moody just like with my pregnancies with my daughter and son. some advice please... thanks
title: really confused
